function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Global collaboration and resource allocation challenges","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cytokine bursts caused by vaccine leading to acute respiratory distress syndrome ards","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for multiple doses of covid-19 vaccine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of unapproved drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of conclusive evidence for the effectiveness of shl oral liquid against covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delay in the development of a commercially viable vaccine for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of preventive measures recommended by who and cdc","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with hand hygiene, social distancing, and other preventative measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to disinfect frequently touched surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use and disposal of masks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 due to lack of effective public health response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential security and privacy risks in the use of digital technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment of iot tools may lead to privacy concerns due to data collection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on iot tools for disease monitoring may lead to false alarms or missed cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorrect interpretation of iot data may lead to misinformed decision-making","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid surge in traffic on iomt tech and telemedicine platforms due to covid-19 outbreak","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaxation of regulations for telehealth services","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of telemedicine platforms for screening covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Minimal human contact treatment using telemedicine strategies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of telemedicine with other technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drone technology for crowd surveillance leading to privacy concerns and potential civil rights violations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Minimized human interaction during the use of drones may lead to reduced community engagement and trust","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate cybersecurity measures for drone technology could lead to data breaches and misuse of surveillance data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of drones for surveillance and crowd monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drones for public announcements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of drones for mass temperature screening","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential invasion of privacy due to constant surveillance by pandemic drones","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hazardous exposure to disinfectant chemicals due to drone spraying","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of technological failure leading to delay in delivery of medical supplies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid delivery of medicines and supplies using drones","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drones for crowd surveillance and disinfection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear government regulatory policies for integrating uavs in the covid-19 impact response system","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the use of drones for delivery","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on drone technology may lead to a reduction in human-to-human interactions, impacting social interactions and community cohesion","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerabilities in drone operations, such as gps jamming and hacking, make drones an attractive prospect for malicious users to conduct cyberterrorism and other unlawful activities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Beyond visible line of sight bvlos drone operations remain somewhat unsafe, requiring technological and operational guidelines for safe operations","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uavs face constraints in terms of battery life and load capacity, inhibiting their capability to cover long distances and make multiple deliveries at once","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Robots in hospitals could malfunction and spread infection instead of containing it","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on robot technology may lead to reduced human oversight and care","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High demand for autonomous disinfection robots could lead to shortages and delays in deployment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contaminated surfaces in hospitals and healthcare settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential exposure to infected individuals during sample collection and patient support","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of virus transmission through traditional delivery mechanisms","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices may lead to false alarms or misdiagnosis of covid-19 symptoms, leading to unnecessary panic or burden on healthcare systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices collecting and transmitting health data may pose privacy and security risks, potentially leading to unauthorized access or misuse of sensitive personal information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on wearables for health monitoring may lead to neglect of traditional healthcare practices and face-to-face medical consultations, resulting in delayed or inadequate medical care for non-covid-19 related conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable may not accurately measure respiratory rates, leading to false notifications and undermining user trust","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collection from wearable devices may raise privacy concerns and lead to misuse of personal health information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of workplace contact tracing wearables may create a sense of surveillance and distrust among employees","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices may not accurately capture and report the wearer’s health status, leading to unreliable data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
